title: [Cancer] People with cancer have more than 3x the odds of dying from Covid, 4x of severe disease and nearly 5x of mechanical ventilation, acc to a new meta-analysis

[Medicine] Engineering soluble human ACE2 to optimize binding to the spike protein of COVID-19 coronavirus as a therapeutic candidate that neutralizes infection by acting as a decoy, reported in a new study in Science (4 August 2020)
